step.text: Start with a square piece of paper, coloured side up. Fold the top corner of the paper down to the bottom corner. Crease and open again. Then fold the paper in half sideways.
Turn the paper over to the white side. Fold the paper in half, crease well and open, and then fold again in the other direction.
Using the creases you have made, Bring the top 3 corners of the model down to the bottom corner. Flatten model.
Using the creases you have made, Bring the top 3 corners of the model down to the bottom corner. Flatten model.
Using the creases you have made, Bring the top 3 corners of the model down to the bottom corner. Flatten model.
Fold top triangular flaps into the centre and unfold.
Fold top of model downwards, crease well and unfold.
Open the uppermost flap of the model, bringing it upwards and pressing the sides of the model inwards at the same time. Flatten down, creasing well.
Open the uppermost flap of the model, bringing it upwards and pressing the sides of the model inwards at the same time. Flatten down, creasing well.
Open the uppermost flap of the model, bringing it upwards and pressing the sides of the model inwards at the same time. Flatten down, creasing well.
Turn model over and repeat Steps 4-6 on the other side.
Fold front flap down.
Fold back flap down.
On the top layer, fold the top corners in to the centre line, and repeat on back.
On the top layer, fold the top corners in to the centre line, and repeat on back.
Form wing by lifting up from the inside, and twisting the wing forwards. Repeat for other wing.
Form wing by lifting up from the inside, and twisting the wing forwards. Repeat for other wing.
Fold top of model down as shown.
Fold back up along crease shown.
Fold whole top down along crease shown.
Cut ONLY TOP layer, along the line shown.
Fold upwards to form feet.
Fold upwards to form feet.
Turn owl over and cut the top layer only as shown.
Turn back over and lift up the ears.
Finished Owl!
